item.description: I am an experienced Compiler, JIT compiler, Dynamic Binary Translator, and Deep Learning deployment and hardware co-design researcher, with a bachelor in Computer Science (UEM, 2016) and on the way to finish a doctorate in Computer Science in one of the most prestigious universities from Latin America, Unicamp, SP/Brazil. In my Ph.D., I am researching mechanisms to improve RISC-V Dynamic Binary Translation to x86, ARM, and MIPS, having in mind IoT/FOG environments.
